content:
As a user, I was annoyed by the table's dimension changing weirdly on hovering table headers.
I am not sure whether a discussion on this issue already exists, hence putting it here for feedback.
Here is the PR for the fix: #25478
Please review the PR and provide your feedback :)
@Hardik Dharmani Seems like a clear improvement to me! Did you test it on a big table to make sure that the headers still stay pinned when you scroll far down in the list?
I have checked in subscribers table with 63 subscribers by going far down it works as expected.
